slogan_title: Elevate Your Online Engagement with Instant AI Chatbot Creation
site_desc: Sign up the waiting list to access your recent created AI chatbot app, and use it for your B2B,B2C or personal needs
pick_emoji_icon: Pick an emoji as the icon for your application!
app_desc_placeholder: This app can translate content from any language to Chinese.
prompt_desc_placeholder: Act as an perceptive for example: SEO expert, offering users tailored tips and strategies to boost their website's search engine visibility and rankings
prompt_desc: The prompt should be clear, understandable, logical, and let ChatGPT become your little helper.
has_openai_key: Do you have an OpenAI API key?
custom_key_p1: To give back to the open-source community and make it easier for everyone to use, we initially supported using your own API key.
custom_key_p2: However, we eventually removed support for custom keys. This was because custom keys could bypass all restrictions, and some people abused this feature we provided to everyone, using OpenGPT as a free server, which caused us very high costs.
custom_key_p3: We are very sorry, but we had no choice.
license_wrong: License Key format is incorrect or the limit has been reached
please_buy: Craft your personalized AI bot in a whimsical journey through our platform, where you'll train, customize, and test your creation before receiving a magical link to access your intelligent digital companion.
runout_today: Today's free limit has been reached. Please purchase additional usage times.
pay_to_use_p1: The OpenGPT project incurs high server costs and OpenAI API costs. If OpenGPT has helped you, please consider paying to use it.
feature_1: Embark on a captivating journey to create your very own AI bot with our intuitive platform. Begin by clicking the Train Your AI button, which transports you to the enchanting Training Playground. Here, you can customize your AI bot to cater to your unique needs, be it customer service, programming, or insightful advice.
feature_2: Put your AI bot's skills to the test and fine-tune its abilities until you're delighted with its performance. Once satisfied, press the Create button and find yourself whisked away to the Waiting List, where AI bots eagerly await their grand debut.
feature_3: As you linger in the Waiting List, your AI bot receives its final magical touches. Soon, a link materializes, granting you access to your personalized, intelligent digital companion, ready to make your life easier and more enchanting.
thanks_to_buy: Thank you for purchasing. The license key has been saved.
60off: Join our exclusive beta adventure! Secure your spot on the waiting list for early access, and be among the first to experience the cutting-edge magic of our AI bot generation platform
click_here_if_paid: Click here if you have already purchased
